official_title: A bill to authorize the expansion of the National Air and Space Museum at Baltimore-Washington International Airport or Washington Dulles International Airport.

summary.text: Authorizes the Smithsonian Institution to develop a master plan for expansion of the National Air and Space Museum at Washington Dulles International Airport or at Baltimore-Washington International Airport that will not interfere with the operations of the airport. Authorizes appropriations for FY 1988 and 1989 for master planning activities.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the expansion of the National Air and Space Museum at Baltimore-Washington International Airport or Washington Dulles International Airport.
